summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition of property in the vicinity of Meridian Avenue North and Northgate Way for a North Administrative Center, health center and park site and fire station; authorizing deferring of purchase payments and execution of notes and mortgages pursuant to ordinance specifically authorizing the same to secure unpaid balances on property acquired, and making appropriations from the park Acquisition and Development Fund, the Seattle Fire Protection Facilities Fund (Stations and Shops), Arterial Development Fund a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor.
